mapper.insert: INSERT INTO music_info (mu_name, mu_ai_seq, mu_lyrics, mu_ab_seq, mu_img_file, mu_music_file, mu_li_seq, mu_playtime, mu_explain_txt, mu_age) VALUES (#{mu_name},#{mu_ai_seq},#{mu_lyrics},#{mu_ab_seq},#{mu_img_file},#{mu_music_file},0,#{mu_playtime},#{mu_explain_txt},#{mu_age})
mapper.select: select ceil(count(*)/10) from music_info where mu_name like '%${keyword}%'
mapper.update: update music_info set mu_img_file = '' where mu_img_file = #{filename}
update music_info set mu_music_file = '' where mu_music_file = #{filename}
